page.title: 06A day at school 3
page.content:
Afternoons at school are usually good fun. We do more practical sort of activities in the afternoon. We often work in groups and have a parent in to help us.
Activities include needlework, model making, woodwork, clay, painting and drawing. In the winter we have games lessons where we can choose to do netball or football. In the summer we have cricket and rounders. We also go swimming everyday if the weather is suitable.
The school has a large field, two playgrounds and an outdoor swimming pool. It is not heated and sometimes the water is{freezing.}
School ends at 3.40 pm.
